rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {DWG2509, DWG2510}

description: This study extends the development of observational acuity and investigation initiated in previous subjects. Sequential projects encourage students to recognise the continually unfolding nature of visual perception and through its engagement discover means for its energetic and vivid description. The subject expands the range of objects and motifs previously studied to stimulate conceptual and technical development.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
